EmailTemplate.name: ASI TnE TW Corp Card Generated Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: T&E Card Claim for {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.ASI_TnE_Sys_Payee__c} has been uploaded for your action (#{!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.OwnerFullName},
A Travel & Entertainment Claim form {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} for Corp Card has been generated. 您公司卡的差旅費申請單{!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name}已產生
Please click this link {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} to view and fulfill the Travel & Entertainment form details. 請按此 {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} 連結 檢閱差旅費申請單明細
